data.title: Ria Lubbers, widow of former prime minister Ruud Lubbers, passed away.
data.meta_description: Ria Lubbers, the widow of former Prime Minister Ruud Lubbers (CDA), passed away last Tuesday. Her family announced this in an obituary in the Rotterdam edition
data.text:
Ria Lubbers (83), widow of former prime minister Ruud Lubbers, has passed away.

2 months ago·Amsterdam, Netherlands

rd.nl

Widow of former premier Ruud Lubbers, Ria Lubbers, has passed away.

Ria Lubbers, de weduwe van oud-premier Ruud Lubbers, is afgelopen dinsdag op 83-jarige leeftijd overleden. Dat meldt haar familie in een rouwadvertentie in AD en NRC.

Ria Lubbers, widow of former prime minister Ruud Lubbers, passed away.

Ria Lubbers, the widow of former Prime Minister Ruud Lubbers (CDA), passed away last Tuesday. Her family announced this in an obituary in the Rotterdam edition of AD. Ria Lubbers would have been 84 years old. It is not clear what she died of. Her husband Ruud Lubbers was Prime Minister between 1982 and 1994. Ria Lubbers frequently appeared in the media during that period. She is also sometimes called the first 'first lady' of the Netherlands. Sh…

Ria Lubbers, candid prime minister, passed away at 83

The wife of former prime minister Ruud Lubbers often gave an insight into what it's like to be prime minister's wife in interviews. “It won't make me rich or poor and it certainly won't make me happy.” She passed away last week.
